{{Wireless embedded system |brand=2Wire |model=2701 |revision=HG-B |upc= |ean= |asin=B001W9ASMS |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/05/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem, CPE |fcc_id=PGR2W2701 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5.1 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel (EIAJ-02) |pwr_barrel_inner=1.7 |pwr_barrel_outer=4.0 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=2Wire |cpu1_model=Ares;3001-000485-003 U, 6TVF25019.1 P, 0946, SINGAPORE; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND128W3A28N6 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H561638J-LCCC |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6061 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=2WIREXXX |default_ssid_regex=^2WIRE[0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=34:EF:44 |oui_eth=34:EF:44 }} This device is/was used with [[AT&T]] for their DSL service.
The default SSID is '''2WIRE''' followed by the last three digits of the serial number. :The default WEP key is printed on the unit under the serial number.
===Forums threads=== *[http://forums.whirlpool.net.au/archive/808533 ''2Wire Modem'' on '''Whirlpool''' forum] :2Wire 2701HG-B - American AT&T - Atheros AR2413A (EEPROM 24C32WI) :[https://www.flickr.com/photos/19084706@N03/1914621204/sizes/l/ 2Wire 2701HG-W PCB] (ADSL2+ CPE for British Telecom's Business Broadband) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=32412 ''2Wire 2701HG-G JTAG'' on '''DD-WRT''' forum] :MPU: 2Wire Ares (Medusa), TriMedia VLIW (Very Long Instruction Word) core *[http://www.the-scream.co.uk/forums/t22658.html ''Unlocked Firmware for BT Business Hub 2700HGV'' on '''Scream''' forum]
